Pujian Valentino Rossi-Jorge Lorenzo untuk Alex Marquez
06 Nov 2019, 16:00 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Dalam pekan balap di Sirkuit Sepang, Malaysia, akhir pekan lalu, Alex Marquez merupakan salah satu rider yang jadi topik pembicaraan panas seisi paddock MotoGP. Pasalnya, ia sukses meraih gelar dunia Moto2 musim ini, yakni gelar keduanya setelah Moto3 2014 lalu. Ia pun banjir pujian dari banyak pihak.
Dua dari pujian-pujian tersebut datang dari dua pebalap MotoGP, Valentino Rossi dan Jorge Lorenzo. Saat ditemui Marca pada Minggu (3/11/2019) usai balap, keduanya sama-sama dimintai komentar soal performa El Pistolas sepanjang musim ini.
"Ia tampil baik. Ia memang layak juara," ucap Rossi singkat. Perlu diingat, adik Rossi, Luca Marini, juga merupakan salah satu rival Marquez. Pada pekan balap di Thailand, yakni usai Marini meraih kemenangan, Rossi juga telah mengucapkan harapannya tahun depan, "Semoga kita bisa menonton duel Marquez vs Marini."
text:
Praise Valentino Rossi-Jorge Lorenzo for Alex Marquez
Nov 6 2019, 16:00 by Bola.net
Bola.net - In the last week of racing at the Sepang Circuit, Malaysia, last weekend, Alex Marquez was one of the riders who became hot topics of the entire MotoGP paddock. The reason, he successfully won the Moto2 world title this season, namely his second title after the 2014 Moto3 last. He was flooded with praise from many parties.
Two of the compliments came from two MotoGP riders, Valentino Rossi and Jorge Lorenzo. When met by Marca on Sunday (3/11/2019) after racing, they were both asked for comments about the performance of El Pistolas throughout this season.
"He performed well. He really deserves a champion," Rossi said curtly. Keep in mind, Rossi's sister, Luca Marini, is also one of Marquez's rivals. In the race week in Thailand, which is after Marini won, Rossi also has said his hopes next year, "Hopefully we can watch the duel Marquez vs Marini."
